date: “2014-04-09” title: “About Me” sidebar: true weight: “1” description: “About me, my academic life, current projects and how to get in touch!” menu: “main” Categories: - “about me”

Hi, I’m jordi! I’m a software engineer living and working in London.

I work mostly in Elixir and Java.

My main interest is in server-side technology and massive scalability, but I’ve been known to dabble in native mobile development, user facing web applications and various other projects.

Check out my GitHub page to see what I’ve been up to recently!

Contact

If you’d like to get in touch, you can find me on LinkedIn or reach me at hello@andreimihu.com
